Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Streptococcus pyogenes and some Enterococci.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: The Sal9 genetic determinants appear generally (but not always) to be megaplasmid-associated, and production seems often to occur in strains that also produce SalA. As is the case for SalA, the production of Sal9 appears to be autoinducible.

Literature.Title: Salivaricin 9, a new lantibiotic produced by Streptococcus salivarius.
Literature.Author: Wescombe PA, Upton M, Renault P, Wirawan RE, Power D, Burton JP, Chilcott CN, Tagg JR.
